column4: so.. are there any certified ubuntu network technicians in here?
is it ubuntu specific or tcp/ip routing specific?
either, really... it just occoured to me in this world of acronyms...
I work as a system/network admin
but I might be able to help.
but, hey, being able to call yourself a Certified Ubuntu Network Technician would be cool
I wonder when they will come out with the Certified Ubuntu Network Technician.
my girlfriend has vista on her laptop
I think that she is a Certified Ubuntu Network Technician sometimes.
